our_story_description: Six years ago we started as a local coffee shop and coffee roaster with a Probatone 5.
how_we_roast_description: We only use world-class professional coffee equipment. Our roastery is exclusively equipped with Probat roasting machineries.
partners_sourcing_description: As a country that doesn’t produce green coffee beans, maintaining our fresh “crop-to-cup” principle comes with a certain set of challenges.
branch_one_description: Our ROC Choijin branch is located at the heart of the business district in Ulaanbaatar and is able to cater to both sit-in or take-away for our customers.
branch_one_location: R.O.C. Choijin, 1st Floor, Choijin Suites, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
branch_two_description: The recently renovated ROC Drink Bar branch adds a new color to the coffee bars of Mongolia and serves special drinks tailored for both day and night. We take pride in serving a variety of alcoholic beverages to cater to our customers' preferences
branch_two_location: R.O.C. Drink Bar, 60th Building (South of State Department Store), 40th Myangat street, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
order_additional_information: Кофены захиалга 12 цагаас өмнө хийгдсэн тохиолдолд тухайн өдөртөө ажилын цагаар хүргэгдэж очино. 12 оос хойш баталгаажсан захиалга дараа өдрийн ажилын цагт багтаж хүргэгдэж очихыг анхаарна уу. Бүтэнсайн өдөр хүргэлт хийгддэггүй тул захиалга 1 дэх өдөр ажилын цагаар хүргэгдэхийг анхаарна уу.
